transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+2% Ally Team Accuracy
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+2% Ally Team Accuracy
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Securing the Culprit
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> chance to reduce the cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>The Culprit is You!</color> by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Increases the chance to reduce cooldown by 80%

SKT_BURST_3.effect: +3 turns increased Critical Damage on allies

description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000066_1_1]</color> chance to reduce the cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>The Culprit is You!</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000066_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Thinking Time
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Triggered Effect) When an ally uses an attack that targets all enemies, grants increased Attack to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>, and increases Priority of ally Mages by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>.
description: (Triggered Effect) When an ally uses an attack that targets all enemies, grants increased Attack to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000066_2_2] turn(s)</color>, and increases Priority of ally Mages by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000066_2_3]</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: The Culprit is You!
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies without <color=#28d9ed>missing</color>, and grants increased Accuracy to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks all enemies without <color=#28d9ed>missing</color>, and grants increased Accuracy to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000066_3_2] turn(s)</color>.

3: +2 turns Increased Critical Hit Chance to all allies

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to grant increased Attack to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000066_chain_1_1]</color> chance to grant increased Attack to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000066_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000066_backup_1_1]</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
